name: 宙空一派
text: 俺は自宅録音家。今年の夏はあずきバーをそんなに食べませんでした。
I do home recording. I didn't eat many Azuki bar this summer.

questions.question: Do you have a own motto/policy?
questions.jp: あなたには座右の銘がありますか？

questions.question: Which is similar to waht you want?
questions.jp: 座右の銘はどちらに近いですか？

questions.question: Do you want to exchange your motto/policy?
questions.jp: 座右の銘を交換してみたいと思いますか？

questions.question: What do you think if your motto/policy must be simplicity and fortitude?
questions.jp: 今日からあなたの座右の銘が「質実剛健」になったらどんな気分ですか？
questions.yes: I think i would be sad
questions.left: どちらかと言えば悲しい
questions.no: I think i would be happy
questions.right: どちらかと言えば嬉しい

questions.question: What do you think if you have to exchange your motto/policy with someone?
questions.jp: 座右の銘（もしくはモットー、ポリシー、考え、信念など）を交換せざるを得ない状況になったら、どう思いますか？

questions.question: A Three years on a stone three years for me is
Good fortune and happiness will come to the home of those who smile
You would choose
questions.yes: Continuity is the father of success
questions.no: Sometimes you just have to give up

questions.question: You would choose
questions.yes: Strike while the iron is hot
